page.title: 04POPULATION Question cont.
page.content: Q. 8) We asked people where they usually go for their bulk food shopping and got 285 replies. 48 shop in the village of Walgrave, 140 shop in Northampton or Weston Favell,a large shopping centre to the east of Northampton , 94 shop in Kettering, 28 in Wellingborough and 17 elsewhere. Q. 9) 101 people use the Walgrave village shops frequently,196 use them occasionally and 55 do not use them at all. Q.10) We asked if people use public transport. 33 use it frequently, 114 occasionally and 162 do not use public transport at all. Q.11) One question asked was whether people worked on a farm or not, 19 did,279 did not.
